attributes.action: Kenneth Clarke as interim prime minster to guide us through the mayhem of Brexit
attributes.background: We feel Kenneth Clarke  would be the only wise experienced MP to get us out of this terrible situation as Father of the House.

rejection.details:
The Prime Minister of the UK is not chosen by the UK Government or Parliament.
After a general election, the Queen decides who to invite to form a Government. In practice, this is usually the leader of the political party that wins the most seats in a general election. 

You can find out more about this here:

http://www.royal.gov.uk/MonarchUK/QueenandGovernment/QueenandPrimeMinister.aspx
